name: Rock Show by Mixology Makeup
description: Rock Show is an electric violet color that adds POP to any eye! This shadow makes a great eyeliner and can be worn light to get a great Spring purple shade or darker to make your eyes Rock! Want to see a great Rock Show? Check Ever Stays Red.com for a show near you! Comes in 10 gram jar with siffter. 3 grams Nt. Wt. Try all the shadows wet or dry! I do have more in stock… mica, iron, oxides, may, contain, zinc, titanium, dioxide Read about our new mission below :) To celebrate the wonderful buzz Mixology is receiving, we want to share our blessings! We are currently donating 5% of our monthly sales, but now we have a bigger mission! Our goal is to be able to sponsor 1 clean water well in an African Village through Blood:Water Mission (www.bloodwatermission.com). To do this, we will be donating $1 per item sold, that’s $1 per item, not $1 per sale! Our hope is to sell 3,000 products for the 1000 Wells Project by December 25th, 2008. Can we do it? With your help we can, we are fortunate enough to never think about where to get pure water only what pure water to choose. Did you know $1 = 1 year of clean water for an African! The 1000 Wells Project is building 1000 wells and clean water projects in 1000 African communities. Businesses, churches, schools, artists and individuals are collecting funds so they can sponsor the construction of wells in Africa. In the process, they are learning about how HIV/AIDS affects African communities, and what it means to partner humbly with communities to pursue transformation. You can also help us by passing this on to any family or friends that would like to be apart of our challenge. Right now 3,000 products seems an impossible goal, but I choose to believe in Incredible things, not Impossible things! Thank you for purchasing makeup so we can donate to Change Lives.

name: Sample Pack - Buy Makeup & Change Lives!
description: Thats right – you heard me – we offer samples! ;) mixologymakeup.com Nervous about foundation choice? Not sure if you dare try that eye shadow? Afraid to ask me to help? lol, just kidding I’m super nice and love your questions! Pick any 5 samples for just $5! When you purchase other items I always throw in a free sample, but if you have particular shades you want to try, this is the way to do it. Now I will be honest, they don’t come in fancy jars and packaging and most include my smiley faces plastered on the baggies, but it does the trick! Once you put this item in the cart, just list in the message space the shades you want to try…. name: Face Love Beauti Kit
description: It’s time to show your face a little lovin! Everything you need to move boldy into Summer & Spring! mixologymakeup.com In this Face Love Kit you will receive 5 full size items ~ 1 foundation of your choice 1 mineral veil of your choice 1 blush / illuminizer / or warmth bronzer 1 Barefaced nightime skin treatment veil (10 gram jar) 1 of our NEW Vegan Baby Kabuki’s or as we like to call it Babuki! Babuki measures 2 inches tall by 3/4 inch in diameter. The bristles measure 1-1/4 inches long and 1 inch in diameter. All comes packaged in a little makeup bag ;) Valued at $78 If you need help selecting shades – send us a photo of who its for and we can help! We are super nice ;) Look for other beauti kits or ask us to customize one for you! Online Offer Only

name: Glitz - All Over Highlight
description: Glitz it up with this diamond shimmer! My fave for doing it up! I dust over my shadow, pout over lip gloss, dust on cheeks, anywhere your heart desires – you can’t mess this one up. mixologymakeup.com New BIGGER size! Comes in a 10 gram jar with sifter. name: Blue Eyes POP Collection
description: Want to make those perty blues stand out in a crowd? Try our Blue Eyes POP Collection! mixologymakeup.com 4 colors picked JUST for you! You will get 3 full eye shadow jars, 1 in Suga, 1 in Fray, 1 in Pirate and 1 full size eyeliner jar in Plum! Overall it’s a savings of $7, you can’t go wrong! Try all of them wet OR dry! Need help getting the perfect application? Take a look at our Amazing Brushes!
